title: I Love City Parks
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 418 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 520L
description: Do you love to go to the park? In this book, you will meet Nina, who loves to go to Chicago's city parks. Nina will introduce you to some famous parks there, including ones with beaches, theaters, sculptures, and fountains. Come spend the day with her!
highFrequencyWords: audience, canyon, elevated, fountain, gigantic, millennium, platform, reflection, theater, uniform
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: R-Controlled Vowels : Read and categorize words with r-controlled vowels
phonics: Multiple Syllable Words                : Identify and divide multiple-syllable words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
